title: I'm no fool with fire
brief_description: Jiminy Cricket shows how humans have depended on fire through the ages and describes the rules of fire safety, how to extinguish a fire and the most effective ways of fire prevention.
description: Jiminy Cricket shows how humans have depended on fire through the ages and describes the rules of fire safety, how to extinguish a fire and the most effective ways of fire prevention.
